definition: Genghis Khan (1162-1227), founder and ruler of the Mongol Empire
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
to think/to consider
perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: You call Chinggis khan as a barbarian, what a joke.
sentences.chinese: 你们说成吉思汗是个野蛮人，这是个笑话。

sentences.english: The great man , genghis khan , only knew how to shoot eagles with an arrow.
sentences.chinese: 一代天骄，成吉思汗，只识弯弓射大雕。

sentences.english: The Uzbek soldiers claimed mercy from Genghis Khan.
sentences.chinese: 这些乌兹别克士兵祈求成吉思汗的宽恕。

sentences.english: Generation day empower , Genghis Khan, knows curved bow to shoot big vulture .
sentences.chinese: 一代天骄，成吉思汗，只识弯弓射大雕。

sentences.english: Mongolian  conqueror Genghis Khan is riding a horse opposite  Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: “一代天骄”成吉思汗骑在马上与拿破仑并驾齐驱。

sentences.english: Khan is one of the greatest conquerors who ever lived.
sentences.chinese: 成吉思汗是史上最伟大的征服者之一。

sentences.english: Temur Khan was the 7th-generation descendant of Genghis Khan.
sentences.chinese: 铁木尔汗是成吉思汗的第七世孙。

sentences.english: Moreover, Ghengis Khan did rule over the northern half of China.
sentences.chinese: 此外，成吉思汗曾经统治过中国的北半部。
接着，成吉思汗就进攻了该城市，并获得了成功。

sentences.english: Fu Manchu seeks the sceptre of Ghenghis Khan so he can rule Asia.
sentences.chinese: 傅满洲寻求成吉思汗的权杖，所以他能统治亚洲。

sentences.english: The Mongol warlord Genghis Khan is famously believed to have fathered hundreds of children in the lands he conquered.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古王成吉思汗据信在他征服之处有数百个孩子。

sentences.english: Timur was an even bloodier conqueror than Genghis had been.
sentences.chinese: 铁木尔是一位甚至比成吉思汗更为血腥的征服者。

sentences.english: Mongol ruler who succeeded his father, Genghis Khan.
sentences.chinese: 成吉思汗完成对天山南北的政治统一。

sentences.english: I knew that by daybreak we would be deep inside Genghis Khan country.
sentences.chinese: 我知道到黎明的时候我们已经深入到成吉思汗的故乡。

sentences.english: Chinggis Khaan, the great Mongol emperor, was born.
sentences.chinese: 成吉思汗，伟大的蒙古皇帝，出生。

sentences.english: And in the Yuan Dynasty, it was the fief of Genghis Khan's descendants.
sentences.chinese: 那么元代的时候啊是成吉思汗子孙的封地。

definition: Temujin, birth name of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2]
Ögedei Khan (1186-1242), a son of Genghis Khan
Mongolia
Tolui (1193-1232), fourth son of Genghis Khan
Khubilai Khan (1215-1294), grandson of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗, first Yuan dynasty emperor, reigned 1260-1294
Jochi (name)
Mongol
Ögedei Khan (1186-1242), a son of Genghis Khan
Timur or Tamerlane (1336-1405), Mongol emperor and conqueror
Muqali or Mukhali (1170-1223), military commander under Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2]
Chagatai (died 1241), a son of Genghis Khan
khan (loanword)
Yollig Taxin or Yelü Dashi (1087-1143), Chinese-educated Khitan leader, founder of Western Liao 西遼|西辽 in Central Asia
Golden Horde (ancient state)
Xiongnu, a people of the Eastern Steppe who created an empire that flourished around the time of the Qin and Han dynasties
Turkic ethnic group
